docs.lead_paragraph: MORE than ever, entire families are packing up and taking trips during the Easter school vacation. Such free time could easily allow for an educations journey high-spotting the major European cities.

headline.main: FIELD TRIP ABROAD; Easter Vacation Offers Opportunity For Families to Tour Europe

docs.snippet: MORE than ever, entire families are packing up and taking trips during the Easter school vacation. Such free time could easily allow for an educations journey high-spotting the major European cities.
